Texts.Eng: Without ^orange;Extraction Devices^reset; progression in FU will be arduous. These wonderful devices ^green;take resource stacks and convert them into useful stuff^reset;. Try it by placing ^orange;50 dirt inside^reset; a ^orange;Hand Mill^reset; built at a ^green;Machining Table^reset;. Be patient. They're slow.

You can also place food, seeds, meats and numerous other goods into extractors. ^green;Try everything you can^reset;. You never know what you'll discover! Upgrading to an ^orange;Extraction Lab^reset; will allow you to work ^green;much^reset; faster.
